title: The entire onsite infrastructure in the Integrated IT Township along with access road shall be provided and maintained by the developer
clause_text: The entire onsite infrastructure in the Integrated IT Township along with access road shall be provided and maintained by the developer. However, it would be obligatory on the part of the developer to provide all basic infrastructures on at least 75% area under the Integrated IT Township within 3 years from the date of sanction of development proposals by the Authority; failing which bank guarantee submitted by the project proponent/s shall be forfeited.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
